DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study evaluate drug-drug interaction montelukast sodium levocetirizine dihydrochloride healthy male volunteer .
DOC.brief_title: A Drug Interaction Study Montelukast Levocetirizine
DOC.criteria: Healthy male Age 20 55 Signed inform consent Has history hypersensitivity IP ingredient Hypotension hypertension Has history acute infection within 14days screen
